<h1 class="api-title">

  show



</h1>





Shows the splashscreen programmatically.









## Usage
```coffeescript
supersonic.app.splashscreen.show()
```


  
    

    
<table class="table" style="margin:0;">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Param</th>
      <th>Type</th>
      <th>Details</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    
  </tbody>
</table>

    

    <h3>Returns</h3>

  <code>Promise</code> Promise that is resolved when the splashscreen is shown.
